_header: Saint Sylvester pope was the first that there came
Note: For a wholly distinct Life in one MS see 555.
Subjects: saints’ lives; Sylvester, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Sylvester in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Siluestre pope was Þe furste þat þare
                    camÞat euere hadde Rome in pes to holde up
                    cristindom…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nou god for is swete loue us graunti þulke
                    blisseÞat Seint siluestre is inne Þat we þar of ne
                    misse
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 391-2.

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint siluester pope was þe furste þat þer
                    comeþat euer hadde rome in pes to hold vp
                    cristendom…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…now god for his swete loue ous graunte þulke
                    blysþat seint siluester is In þat we þer of ne
                    mysse
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint siluestre pope was þe ferst þat þer comþat euer hadde rome in pes to holde op cristendom…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for his suete loue ous graunte þilke blisseþat sein siluestre in heuen is þat we þer of ne misse
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xCvi” added to left margin by later hand (f. 268v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge2810.First Lines: Seint siluestre þe bissop in is ȝonge childe hedebigan at þe uerst tyme ihesu crist to drede…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …At rome saynt elyne deide and þer he buryed isswete ihesu crist fore har lous bring vs to þi blisse

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Siluestre Pope was þe first þat euer comeÞat
                    euer hade Rome in pees to holde vp cristendome…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now god for his swete love vs graunte þat blisÞat
                    saynt siluestre is in in heuen þat we þerof ne mys. Amen
